website_summaries.verdict: Great price on a good skate for beginners that works well on smooth surfaces.
pros: Lower boot, but not a speed boot height
cons: The wheels seem to wear quickly on this model, particularly near the brake

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are not good for concrete.
customer_reviews.text: My son got these for Christmas. It's January 29th now. He has used them maybe 10 times in the driveway. The wheels need to be replaced already.
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: I haven't roller bladed since I was a kid. My wife always wanted to go with me so we finally bought a pair for me again. I actually saw these in a store and tried them on in person before finding them here on Amazon for cheaper. They fit remarkably well (normal shoe size) without any uncomfortable rubbing or pinching that seems commonplace for me in roller blades. No blisters or sores after our first skate. These are great. Much looser wheels than I had anticipated, so if you haven't been in a while take it easy your first time again! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Run big, but very nice skates
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11 1/2 US in regular shoes. So, I got the 11 hoping they wouldn't be to small... lol. Well, to my amazement, they are too big. I am wondering if I should try the size 10, but afraid they might be to small. Other than the sizes running big (at least with the pair I received) they are great skates for the price. I would still recommend these skates for this price point, just be aware of your size choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for novices
customer_reviews.text: great value. i chase my 5 year old around with these and he has a small bike i can fit into my car. i got these so i can keep up with him while keeping my hands free and not having to lug an adult bike around (get a rack). great wheels and build quality. the stock wheels work pretty good on asphalt if you ask me. think i'd be going too fast with harder wheels, but i'm sure pro skaters have different needs.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Bawl

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday gift for an 11 year old. He loved them and put them to action right away. No issues with driveway and skate park use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are durable and the rollers are still as good as new even with the excessive use
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has had these skates now for 5 months. He goes to the rinks every Saturday night and skates 5 hours and they never let him down. They are durable and the rollers are still as good as new even with the excessive use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: diane coghill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price. Made my feet sweat.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product for the price. Wore them to my son's skating B-day party this past weekend. I had only skated once in the last 20 years, and not on blades in almost 20 years. A bit more ankle support would have been a great addition. I am used to blakes that engage just by sliding the foot forward, but apparently this feature was discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These are not top-end skates, but they are an excellent value. It is a bit hard to pull the laces snug, but otherwise they perform well. I can skate for 1 hour or or so with minimal discomfort. I first tried the K2 Kinetic 80, but the boot was too soft and I found it much harder to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Here the game begin
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking to get this for a long time but didn't make any move. This time... I really bought it and start playing with it. Love the design, sturdy and good roller. Perfect for flat. I used it for 4weeks now, almost every weekend, ~10miles, no issue so far.
customer_reviews.author: HOW KIAN BOON

customer_reviews.title: not recommended
customer_reviews.text: So read the reviews after and I agree 100% about what the guy said for the laces. The shoe is secure but the laces that tighten around the base/toes of your feet is only the liner which leaves for a wobbly experience. Also it seems that the wheels are slanted inward which I'm not sure if that is normal or not. It doesn't seem practical but ill leave it at 2 stars assuming thats normal. Just got them today and put about a mile on them. I hurt a little
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting back into it
customer_reviews.text: I really like these skates so far. They’re comfortable and easy to wear for an hour so. I’m just getting back into rollerblading after having done it as a kid and teenager, and these seem pretty perfect for skating around the neighborhood, which is what I’ve done so far. The wheels haven’t shown any wear at all, nor has the brake. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: 1 flaw to these skates I didn't like!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem i had with them was that they weren't secure enough in the shoelace area. The 2 straps are perfect but the flaw is where the laces are. being that its literally a sock connected to the plastic base no matter how tight you pull the laces it's not solid enough for the best balance. It's hard to explain but I recommend getting blades that have a full plastic shoe and a sock that pulls out the laces should connect to the outer shoe. It's hard to explain people just trust me your foot will be wobbly in these blades and will make for an uncomfortable ride if you plan to use them for over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Ney

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, comfy, but very easy to fall
customer_reviews.text: I got these for myself, even though they're guys' rollerblades, I liked the color, and got my size. They fit perfectly, easy to move your feet around in. But I'm giving them away because they are very slick. I like something that's a little tougher to push yourself in. I wore these and fell enough times to let them go. I could maintain them to see if I couldn't fix it, I'm not sure if that would, but I honestly don't know enough about their maintenance so I'm giving them to someone who does more.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: One is missing a brake
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. Only one skate has a brake on it. We searched the box carefully, there wasn't another one there. I cannot figure out to contact the seller but will probably return. I guess they're OK otherwise but my son hasnt seemed too impressed with them.
customer_reviews.author: KY Mudd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skates!
customer_reviews.text: They look good, they feel good and they are fast with those abec-7 bearings. They look (in my size 11) almost like a hockey skate, and I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Wheels wear down fast, but perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: These wheels are meant for roller rink, smooth surfaces. I’ve had these for about a month and the insides are already worn down from use in my driveway and the local outdoor hockey rink. The skate itself however is very nice, not a lot of forward lean so it’s easy for beginners and packs in a lot of support. You can also replace the sole insert if it feels too flat. It will be perfect for beginners or someone that wants to pick up the sport to see if they are able to do it, but not meant for long term or extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mente

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and Dads with skating kids
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very comfortable Great for recreational Style is nice Durable Didn't break the bank. Cons None for me. I bought these to go skating with my daughter. She likes to go to the skating ring. So I bought some cause the rentals suck. These are probably not good for extreme skating. The durability would not support extreme use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel stallard

customer_reviews.title: Wheels not straight
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10.5 and got size 11 and they had a lose feeling. Also when I used them the first time I noticed that my feet bending inward. I later notice that the rail and wheels were not lined up straight. I put them back in the box and returned them. Once my refund is credited I will buy the rollerblade Zetrablade size 10 which my wife got and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Roller blades
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these, comfortable and completely what I expected. Can't wait to get back in them!
customer_reviews.author: Ang3laMarie

customer_reviews.title: MISSING THE BRAKES
customer_reviews.text: The rollerblades themselves are ok. Perfect for the occasional rollerblader. However, mine arrived missing the brakes on the back of the blades. A little disappointed seeing as I spent over $100.00 on them.
customer_reviews.author: Janai

customer_reviews.title: poor craftsmanship, striped screws out of the box
customer_reviews.text: 3rd different set of blades over the past 2 years. poor craftsmanship, striped screws out of the box, seams rip out quickly. can't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Macek

customer_reviews.title: I think its a good start for getting back into blading
customer_reviews.text: I think its a good start for getting back into blading. I would say my only critique is that it dosnt rise very high above the ankle, so it can make you feel as though there isnt much support. Otherwise it works well and I have enjoyed using them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Painter

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I ordered. The first pair I received the left boot was warped. The entire wheel assembly was tilted inward and made it next to impossible to skate. I immediately sent them back and got a replacement 2 days later. The second pair was too narrow for my wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These scares will hurt your feet. I bought them in december and I have used them 3 times. They are not comfortable at all. The bottom of your feet feel like there is no cushion. The ankles hurt. I wish I could just return them and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great skates - from a newbie
customer_reviews.text: I've never roller-bladed before. These skates seem great. Just one tip: cinch them up tight.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Arnott

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bough th these to go skating with my daughter. They feel great and I like that they use laces and straps to get the fit right where i like it
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Romani

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old loves these. They are smooth and comfortable he says
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money but I’d spend more if you can
customer_reviews.text: These run big. If your a half size, go lower ie; 9.5=9 also I sent them back because the frame rails are made of plastic and my left skate started to bend a little and threw off my ankle
customer_reviews.author: michael l mccolley

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Soft Wheels
customer_reviews.text: This are great for just casual skating. Sturdy and adjust well. Only sown side is how soft the wheels are. After about 4 months of regular use I needed to replace them. (I'm also 6'3 210lb in fairness, which definitely added to it.)
customer_reviews.author: Lars Torkelson

customer_reviews.title: These suck
customer_reviews.text: I fell once and it broke its super cheaply made don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: C. Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with this product, I’ve been using them for just over a month now and go roller blading at the beach almost every day. The wheels are definitely made for smoother surfaces so be cautioned before going on the streets. After you pick up the basic skills of roller blading, these work great. There is a little bit of extra space around the middle of the foot, but I have very narrow feet. Overall, highly recommend for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Burts

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit. The straps make for a nice tight fit. New to rollerblading found this to be very important. The quality is good and the sizeing is accurate and true. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D33n

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of Rollerblades in 1989. The improvements made in skates since then are amazing. These are easier to use, more secure, require less upkeep, and are more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K. Schloss

customer_reviews.title: I ride for a hour a day with these, they’ve been great
customer_reviews.text: I was very spectacle while buying this, good adult roller blades are hard to come by. I’m so glad I bought these, they’re great! Very comfortable, great padding and they glide very well 👌🏻 I live next to a bike trail so I ride these for about a hour a day, they've been great.
customer_reviews.author: hannah avarell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my sons birthday. He loves them. Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Micalyndudney

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes them, he had a similar pair that wore out after years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Total success! Great blades.....fast shipping, totally happy with he purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Says they are faster and smoother than his last pair. His feet also do not become fatigued while wearing them. A definite for beginners and experienced.
customer_reviews.author: cinteza

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve given a 5 star but the bearings are not very fast at all. They are basic ABEC 7 and probably the cheapest they could find. ALL else is great! Spend $30 and put in a set of 16 Bones Reds bearings and you’re SET!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use!! Wheels wear fast
customer_reviews.text: I love my skates they would get 5 stars but my wheels are gone on only 4 uses, when your researching product info they have pictures of people skating out doors which is what i mainly do. Just bought another set of wheels only a month into owning these skates!!
customer_reviews.author: Frankb714

customer_reviews.title: After like 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: After like 3 months of use, they are still in good shape, some movements make the boot and the wheel housing feel loose between each other, but that's because I was an ice skater. They aren't bad for some casual skates. Suggest getting own wheels
customer_reviews.author: Damon M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Good for those with wide feet. Has little friction so it is good for those who have learnt how to move with good balance. Good price for the quality you receive
customer_reviews.author: lil

customer_reviews.title: Beginners Only
customer_reviews.text: These skates come with 80 mm wheels and 78a hardness. Not as advertised but I’ve already used them. 78a is very gripping and difficult to stop hockey style... very difficult. Otherwise they’re a great skate for the price, especially if you’re just starting.
customer_reviews.author: John Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Get a bigger size.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as they were just too uncomfortable and dangerous. Husband was emphatic I return. Not good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved them. He took the brakes off cause he’s strange which caused the back side to be a little loose since the screw is too long but still work great. Perfect fit and roll smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lively

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves his new skates and I feel like I got a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: The boot completely fell apart and lost its shape in one ride. I’m fairly small (138lbs / 5’8) I thought these would work well however there is no support in the wide boot. The break is all over the place and I have only wore them for less than 30 min total
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: bought for my grandson and he loves them he is 12
customer_reviews.author: nancy robeson

customer_reviews.title: Great rollerblades!
customer_reviews.text: Great rollerblades for beginners/ intermediate! Would reccomend these rollerblades! Had them for about 1 month now wheels are chipping already need to switch them bit overall great skates
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: First off, i'd like thank Titan for helping so much get my package delivered. Fed Ex had a big delay in packages and Titan made sure to follow up daily and keep well in touch with me on the status. I ordered two pairs,, one for myself and one for my partner. I really like the rollerblades, tighter fit to help hold up for us beginers and looking forward to using them this summer and fall.
customer_reviews.author: kevin patelczyk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid but wheel spin not the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as replacement of another product. Overall it is a decent product but I felt I did not glide as far as before. Checked by spinning the wheels, they don’t spin as friction free as my last product. It is cheaper though.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great blades!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé absolutely loves!! Uses them everyday after working while I’m working out
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! He was even excited about the color. My daughter loves them too, so I guess we have to get her a pair as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband 4 months ago and so far he says they are comfortable. Great wheels! He uses them indoors only and are very smooth and fast. I have a pair, same brand, in womens and I feel the same about them.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLove11

customer_reviews.title: Very very bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Both pairs that I bought did not last. The wheels are all worn down in a matter of 6 months. These cost good money for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and smooth to ride.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and comfortable, I used them for about 2 hours and felt really comfortable and great. Smooth to ride and great for beginners (like me).
customer_reviews.author: Marco A. Alvarez Rengifo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 15 year-old. He's satisfied. Doesn't have as much support as his previous (plastic-booted) pair, so it's for advanced skaters. He says they go fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and the quality was a lot better than expected. My son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Below average
customer_reviews.text: I really was not impressed with these roller blades. One of them makes a weird noise.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Solovyanchik

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners but that's it
customer_reviews.text: The boot being elastic doesn't really feel well connected to the track of the wheels. First pair of skates I spend my money on as an adult, after skating for many years as a teenager, and I regret not spending more on a better pair.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Crappy design, does not support your weight correctly.
customer_reviews.text: These rollerblades do not provide enough stability when using them. Either your legs will bow in or bow out depending on where you hold your weight. I really poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Spikey

customer_reviews.title: Bad wheels
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable boot and great for beginners. Only reason I didnt give 5 stars is because the wheels are already losing integrity. I noticed after 3-4 trips of maybe 3 miles in length, the wheels are getting chewed up.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Broke a rib. Needs more break support
customer_reviews.text: I broke a rib on these babies soooooo watch out
customer_reviews.author: RNR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, wait til you unbox before getting accessories
customer_reviews.text: Impressed w overall quality and how quickly item arrived to Guam. Surprised to have received the green & black version though. Description of this item clearly states it’s red & black. I’ll still use it but I’m glad I didn’t get wheels in colors that would clash w what I actually received.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of skates, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but ergonomic issue by nature
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set but I wish the skate had an adjustable angle since my left foot seems off balance 20 years later.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 16 y/o son for Christmas and he loves them. He's already gone to the roller rink a couple times - says they're smooth and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Waters

customer_reviews.title: You'll enjoy these.
customer_reviews.text: These work great, roll well, and fit just to their labeled size, only peev I would mention is that the Velcro sometimes tugs on the laces when putting them on or taking them off. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo silva

customer_reviews.title: The wheels broke, and I am outside my return window!!!
customer_reviews.text: The skates were great, until... the wheels literally broke off. I am hopeful someone from the company will reach out to me and allow me to exchange them for a new pair, the website does not give me a return option.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Hakim

customer_reviews.title: ... around the ankles but not an issue with some good socks. can go pretty fast but seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: can be a little tight around the ankles but not an issue with some good socks. can go pretty fast but seem to top out around 25 mph for me, good beginner skates
customer_reviews.author: mamatgc49

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok,but it's impossible to reach customer service.I want to remove brake but the product doesn't come with shorter axle.In Q/A it says to contact them and they 'll send you shorter part but that's not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Przemyslaw

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband, and he really loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crooked rollerblade.....
customer_reviews.text: I love these rollerblades, but the left one seems to be built crooked. I’m having a hard time balancing my left side and have to work harder while rollerblading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... these for our church function and they turned out great! Quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these for our church function and they turned out great! Quick shipping, true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Gisella Mancilla

customer_reviews.title: Woah super fast on. Concrete
customer_reviews.text: These will have you floating down the street tooooooooo day on fast lol
customer_reviews.author: Idea

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love skate !!! those are so comfortable and soft. Good quality,
customer_reviews.author: Laura Varon

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! Bought it for my boyfriend and he uses them very often. They fit very well and never gives him blisters or anything!
customer_reviews.author: Raine Thoma

customer_reviews.title: no problems here!
customer_reviews.text: they're great, think a bit over priced but worth it!! Going to use them to ride to school, and just to ride around with friends! I'd recommend these. now the real question is where could I find red led wheels for these??
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: These roller blades are very good, my only problem is, if you’re starting out rollerblading, buy a size that’s just right or maybe even a bit smaller because if the rollerblades are too big, they will strain your shins.
customer_reviews.author: Fergus Lin

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my son, he's 8, for ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son, he's 8, for Christmas, He's had them for three months and absolutely loves them! My boy is very rough and they have stood up to his destruction!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson loves them. Well made with good support.
customer_reviews.author: martha miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My son love them! Especially ability to adjust the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: M3party

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rollerbades for someone starting our. Or for an old guy like me. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: This product was fun while it lasted, however the quality is very poor. Wheels shred very easily, and the straps on the boots frey. Every time I strap in I feel like I might break a piece of the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Parker ELL

customer_reviews.title: Decent first blades
customer_reviews.text: Laces wore out quickly and are easily replaced. Tires wear fairly quickly from use but overall good skates for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Kohl Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Just be careful with the skates
customer_reviews.text: I find that line of the buckles are so tight I had to force my feet to get in u hate discomfort.but it’s a good bit otherwise and fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Edmond Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Pair of Skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson and he loves them. The sizing chart was perfect for him and he uses them constantly!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking design!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic skates! Bought for my 11 year old son, with room to grow. Easy for him to put on and good stability!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Rakestraw

customer_reviews.title: Their wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son for Easter and he loves them!! He likes skating out side and at the rink!!
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo Lady 80

customer_reviews.title: Great rollerblades!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing roller blades! They fit great and have lasted some really unpaved roads. I would recommend these to anyone who wants rollerblades!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Stoner

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for my husband as birthday gifts. It fits perfect to true shoe size. He liked them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Rollerblades with great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, feel sturdy, with terrific support around your ankle. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a good Rollerblader and these were hard to enjoy. They also wouldnt let me return it just a few weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: hpjjj

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit big
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11, feeling like I should have gone with the size 10 for the blades. The 11 rocks on the bottom of my foot. Feels extra sketchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Roller Blades
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my grandson. They fit perfectly. He rollerbladed until his legs were sore! Big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Zoesgran

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is amazing but when it was the delivered it seemed as if someone had thrown the package. I found the box open and on its side.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality rollerblades. Wheels are very solid and sturdy and breaks work very well. Used them in the rain a few times and they work great! After a while in the rain the wheels will squeak a little but will stop once they dry.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great fit, very aesthetically pleasing. I've used them many times.
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: Very much worth the money. I have a narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: Very much worth the money. I have a narrow foot and had to put two insoles in them to keep steady.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald F Shackleton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The box had a shower stool in it. Not even roller blades
customer_reviews.author: josephdison

product_meta.title: Bladerunner by Rollerblade Advantage Pro XT Men's Adult Fitness Inline Skate, Black and Red, Inline Skates
product_meta.description: Advantage Pro XT is a recreational skate for men, designed for comfort and control. Bladerunner uses Rollerblade design expertise to create a comfortable liner, secure closure system and a shock-absorbing composite frame for a lower center of gravity. 80mm Bladerunner wheels and ABEC 7 bearings allow for moderate speed with less effort, providing better stability; brake is standard. Advantage Pro XT is an ideal model for the novice male skater, at an ideal price.
feature_bullets: IDEAL FOR NEW SKATERS - Novice skate for men at an ideal price: comfort, control and stability
SUPPORTIVE SHELL - Rollerblade design provides extra foot support and balance
COMFORT LINER - Padded liner ensures a snug fit with an easy closure system: buckles, lace and strap
COMPOSITE FRAME - Durable frame design increases stability
BLADERUNNER WHEELS - 80mm wheels with ABEC 7 bearings for moderate speed with less effort
